title: Olympic games Amsterdam 1992
content:
In 1986 Amsterdam tried to get the Olympic summer games for 1992, and ran a campaign in which some railway coaches were specially decorated.  
Could any of you identify the typeface of "Amsterdam 1992" here? It looks a bit like Franklin Gothic Condensed (angled terminals, variations in stroke widths) - but that doesn't seem to be fully accurate, for example the "1" in Franklin Gothic is totally different, having a big serif at the base.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425145151im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Amsterdam1992_4792.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425145151im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Amsterdam1992_detail_3693.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425145151im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Amsterdam1992_side_5580.jpg)

Thanks and greetings! I'm planning to make a model of this.  
(edit: added two more photos, better angle/size)
author: tbk
